title: Start
body:
<<move J-Pe StageRight2>><<move Aig StageLeft2>>
<<outfit J-Pe Casual>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Hey Aig.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Oh, hey J-Pe.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
You've been taking dance practice seriously lately, huh?
->It's fun!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Happy>>
    Yeah, it's fun!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Happy>>
    Well, keep up the good work.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Thanks!
->I could be better...
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    Ah, I could be better...
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Angry>>
    <<statDown Friendship Angry>>
    Don't be such a bummer, man.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    S-sorry.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe Happy>>
    C'mon! We've got so much to look forward to!
->I've always taken it seriously.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Well, I've always taken it seriously.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    That's right, you got recruited through a dance audition, right?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah, way back when...
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    Man, that was a few years ago now, wasn't it?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe Happy>>
I still can't believe we're finally about to make our debut soon. Exciting, isn't it.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig Happy>>
Yeah! I'm just glad to be with my two best bros for it.
<<name Friendship ...>>
As you say this, your gaze flickers up to the empty fourth bed in your dormitory for a second.
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<expression J-Pe Neutral>>
You try your best to put the lingering feeling of guilt out of your head.
